junitx.framework
Class ArrayAssert

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--junit.framework.Assert
        |
        +--junitx.framework.ArrayAssert
public class ArrayAssert
extends junit.framework.Assert

A set of assert methods specially targetted to asserting arrays.

Version:
$Revision: #1 $ $Date: 2016/12/14 $
Author:
Vladimir R. Bossicard

Method Detail

assertEqualArrays

public static void assertEqualArrays(java.lang.String message,
                                     java.lang.Object[] expected,
                                     java.lang.Object[] actual)
Asserts that two arrays are equal. Throws an AssertionFailedError if they are not. Two arrays are considered equals if:
  • their respective lengths are the same
  • the respective messages must be equal
  • the respective localized messages must be equal

assertEqualArrays

public static void assertEqualArrays(java.lang.Object[] expected,
                                     java.lang.Object[] actual)
Asserts that two arrays are equal. Throws an AssertionFailedError if they are not.

See Also:
Assert.assertEquals(String, Object, Object)
